posts.post_content: Yea he pulls ALOT of aggro, good cards do. Thats why they made [Vines of Vastwood](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Vines of Vastwood) and [Canopy Cover](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Canopy Cover) for standard. Point is, he can win the game by himself, or you can use him to win the game with [Emrakul, the Aeons Torn](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Emrakul, the Aeons Torn) or [Joraga Warcaller](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Joraga Warcaller). 5/5 hands down.
posts.html:

posts.post_content:
Since [Upwelling](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Upwelling) has reminder text stating that its effect stops mana burn, I'm guessing Omnath would have stopped it too. The risk would have been in getting hit with it once Omnath dies and the mana pool is emptied. Ouch.  
  
@CarlosLiberated: Hint - [Rofellos, Llanowar Emissary](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Rofellos, Llanowar Emissary) is only banned as a general, you can use him in your deck.
posts.html:
Since Upwelling has reminder text stating that its effect stops mana burn, I'm guessing Omnath would have stopped it too. The risk would have been in getting hit with it once Omnath dies and the mana pool is emptied. Ouch.

posts.post_content:
I've taken mana production to the next level. Captain Sisay EDH featuring:  
  
[Omnath, Locus of Mana](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Omnath, Locus of Mana)  
[Doubling Cube](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Doubling Cube)  
[Keeper of Progenitus](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Keeper of Progenitus)  
[Mirari's Wake](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Mirari's Wake)  
[Vernal Bloom](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Vernal Bloom)  
[Vorinclex, Voice of Hunger](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Vorinclex, Voice of Hunger)  
[Caged Sun](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Caged Sun)  
[Sword of Feast and Famine](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Sword of Feast and Famine)  
  
End game usually involves casting multiple Eldrazi with [Akroma's Memorial](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Akroma's Memorial) on the same turn. In one game, I miracled [Entreat the Angels](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Entreat the Angels) for 157. And had mana left over for Akroma's Memorial. Sure, it's not infinite mana, but I find this more fun.
posts.html:
I've taken mana production to the next level. Captain Sisay EDH featuring:

Omnath, Locus of Mana
Doubling Cube
Keeper of Progenitus
Mirari's Wake
Vernal Bloom
Vorinclex, Voice of Hunger
Caged Sun
Sword of Feast and Famine

End game usually involves casting multiple Eldrazi with Akroma's Memorial on the same turn. In one game, I miracled Entreat the Angels for 157. And had mana left over for Akroma's Memorial. Sure, it's not infinite mana, but I find this more fun.
